name: Envoy 2
description: At the moment this is an intervention pilot version. Anti-game or a game-contest with a great challenge.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo @ 2.4 Ghz / AMD Athlon 64 X2 5200+ Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 560 ti / AMD Radeon HD 7850 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Short Review: Total mindless and unfinished scum  Long Review: Total mindless and unfinished scum, crap, ♥♥♥♥, not a game ... even not a tech demo. If you want to have a little fun, try to change resolution ... after that you know everything about that game and its developer.  Thx Steam for selling such rip offs, but slowly I get used to it. Thats why I here dont buy any games anymore and wait for indiegala or other bundles ...  But ok, Gaben needs more Ferraris ...

This game I was advised by a friend. God, I hate it. No, the game is not bad... It's very complicated. I'm not smart enough to complete it.  Picture of the game is beautiful, but very hard game engine.  You think you're smart? Try to play this game.
